alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:51AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 230 AM MST... At 151 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Wickenburg to 12 miles east of Aguila to 14 miles southeast of Gladden. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg, Wittmann, Circle City and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 89 and 128. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert
